languages.text: Если существо продолжает гореть, когда завершается действие Метки скверны, оно получает (от 30 до 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если существо продолжает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}гореть{/g}, когда завершается действие Метки скверны, оно получает (от 30 до 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.
Если существо продолжает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}гореть{/g}, когда завершается действие Метки скверны, оно получает (от 30 до 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

languages.text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

languages.text: 当腐化印记失效时，如果此生物依然处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，则会受到30-45点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [暂定] 当腐化印记失效时，如果此生物依然处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}状态{/g}，则会受到30-45点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。

languages.text: 腐敗の印が終了する際、この生物が依然{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}を受けていると、30～45の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [草案]腐敗の印が終了する際、この生物が依然{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受けていたら、30-45の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}<歪み>ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Si esta criatura sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} cuando acabe su Marca de corrupción, recibe (de 30 a 45) de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.
languages.original_text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si esta criatura sigue sufriendo un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} cuando acabe su marca de corrupción, recibe 30-45 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g}.

languages.text: Ist diese Kreatur noch mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} belegt, wenn Mal der Verderbnis endet, erleidet sie 30 bis 45 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [Entwurf] Wenn diese Kreatur noch unter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} leidet, wenn das Mal der Verderbnis endet, erleidet sie 30-45 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warpschaden{/g}.

languages.text: Si cette créature est toujours sous l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} lorsque Marque de corruption prend fin, elle subit 30 à 45 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.
languages.original_text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [brouillon] Si cette créature est toujours sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} lorsque Marque de Corruption prend fin, elle subit 30 à 45 points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, Yozluğun İzi sona erdiğinde hâlâ {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanıyorsa{/g} (30 ila 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: If this creature is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} when Mark of Corruption ends, it suffers (from 30 to 45) {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
